release.name: v4.1.0
release.body:
## What's Changed
* Allow enums to be used as event names, add proper template types by @cspray in https://github.com/labrador-kennel/async-event/pull/34


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/labrador-kennel/async-event/compare/v4.0.0...v4.1.0
release.short_description_html:
What's Changed

Full Changelog: v4.0.0...v4.1.0
